overview: Ovidie accepts her chair and plans to pass on her broad knowledge of sexuality with these three movies. Funnily enough for this project she even puts on the grouchy face of a school teacher.  The first film is all about contraceptives and similar prophylactics that should help the uninitiated to learn all about the use of sex toys and even how to explore the pussy the hard way -e.g. double vaginal and fisting. After that you get to hear about the pleasures of anal intercourse and how to enjoy it right from the very beginning. And to finish all this off several porn stalwarts let the viewers know about their tips and tricks: how to deal with erection problems, condom hate and how to prevent a premature ejaculation.  In all the three movies these theories are vividly illustrated with candid shots of stars such as Melanie Coste and Ovidie herself. Of course with a little help from their respective film partners.
title: Extreme Sex Manual
